# PLAYBACK

| Option     | Description                                                                                                                                  |
|------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| !Eye Sensor Icon EYE SENSOR | Putting your eye to the viewfinder turns the viewfinder on and the LCD monitor off; taking your eye away turns the viewfinder off and LCD monitor on. |
| LCD ONLY   | LCD monitor on, viewfinder off.                                                                                                              |
| EVF ONLY   | Viewfinder on, LCD monitor off.                                                                                                              |

## The Eye Sensor

The eye sensor may respond to objects other than your eye or to light shining directly on the sensor.

!Eye Sensor
